function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Sociopolitical instability and limited socioeconomic development in malaria-endemic areas","Impact":"Decreased funding for malaria control, increased insecticide prices, and reduced operational capacity in disease control programs","Mitigation":"Investment in socioeconomic development, stability, and targeted malaria control measures","Technologies":"Remote sensing, GIS mapping technology for identifying high-risk areas","People":"Population in malaria-endemic areas","Owner":"Government, international aid and development organizations"},{"Description":"Insecticide and drug resistance","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of malaria control measures and interventions","Mitigation":"Research and development of new insecticides and drugs, implementation of integrated vector management strategies","Technologies":"Genetic modification of mosquitoes, development of new antimalarial drugs","People":"Public health authorities, researchers, pharmaceutical companies","Owner":"Government, pharmaceutical companies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Rebound of malaria transmission after intervention cessation","Impact":"Resurgence of malaria to pre-intervention levels after control measures are discontinued","Mitigation":"Sustainable and long-term malaria control strategies, community engagement and education on disease prevention","Technologies":"Health education and awareness campaigns, community health workers for surveillance and case management","People":"Population in malaria-endemic areas, public health authorities","Owner":"Government, international aid and development organizations"}]}
